## UserConfig.severityReport property

The severity level considered to be an report-able event. NOTE: This will also include all severity levels above the selected number as well (event is a report-able when severityAlert &lt;= event.severity).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
severityReport: Severity;
```
